propositions.text: The document is titled '月华成璧'.
The document is structured into chapters, starting with '第一章 梦醒时分' (Chapter 1: The Moment of Waking) and proceeding sequentially up to '第十章 岁月静好' (Chapter 10: Years of Quiet Peace).
The document contains appendices: '附录：人物关系表' (Appendix: Character Relationship Chart) and '附录：武功秘籍简介' (Appendix: Introduction to Martial Arts Manuals).
The document includes a '参考文献' (References) section.
The document includes a '鸣谢' (Acknowledgements) section.
The provided text contains OCR errors and garbled characters, making precise structural and semantic analysis impossible.
The structure presented is based on common novel chapter naming patterns due to text corruption.
